rules_text:
Reach
[i]Retainer[/i] – Noble spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Optimistic[/i] – Whenever you draw your second card each turn, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
[i]Trap Prone[/i] – Whenever Setsuna, Absent Archer or another Archer you control blocks, investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
